document.full_text: the dallas mavericks overcame a 16-point deficit and an aggressive kobe bryant to steal game one of their second round playoff series with a last-second 96-94 triumph on monday.
document.title: mavs steal opener from lakers, hawks stun bulls
lines_and_colors: the dallas mavericks overcame a 16-point deficit and an aggressive kobe bryant to steal game one of their second round playoff series with a last-second 96-94 triumph on monday.
